schemas.name: ref
schemas.description: Contains reference data used across the system, such as geographic regions, countries, administrative divisions, employee rankings, and regulations.

tables.name: regions
tables.description: Stores geographic regions, providing a hierarchical level for organizing countries.

columns.name: region_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each region.

columns.name: region_name
columns.description: The name of the region, limited to 25 characters.

tables.name: countries
tables.description: Stores country information and associates it with a geographic region.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each country.

columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the country, up to 40 characters.

columns.name: region
columns.description: Reference to the region the country belongs to.

columns.name: created_on
columns.description: Timestamp when the country record was created.

columns.name: updated_on
columns.description: Timestamp when the country record was last updated.

columns.name: code
columns.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code.

tables.name: provinces
tables.description: Stores administrative province information and links each province to a country.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each province.

columns.name: country
columns.description: Reference to the country the province belongs to.

columns.name: code
columns.description: Unique code representing the province, limited to 2 characters.

columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the province, up to 50 characters.

tables.name: cities
tables.description: Stores city information, including its administrative type and which province it belongs to.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each city.

columns.name: province
columns.description: Reference to the province the city belongs to.

columns.name: code
columns.description: Unique city code with a length of 4 characters.

columns.name: type
columns.description: Numeric value indicating the type of city (e.g., metropolitan, urban, rural).

columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the city, up to 50 characters.

tables.name: ranks
tables.description: Stores information about employee ranks, including salary ranges.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each rank.

columns.name: code
columns.description: Unique code identifying the rank, up to 5 characters.

columns.name: name
columns.description: Name of the rank, up to 50 characters.

columns.name: min_salary
columns.description: Minimum salary range for the rank.

columns.name: max_salary
columns.description: Maximum salary range for the rank.

tables.name: echelons
tables.description: Stores information about employee echelons, including salary ranges and references to the rank hierarchy.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each echelon.

columns.name: name
columns.description: Name of the echelon, up to 50 characters.

columns.name: min_rank
columns.description: Reference to the minimum rank required for this echelon.

columns.name: max_rank
columns.description: Reference to the maximum rank allowed for this echelon.

columns.name: min_salary
columns.description: Minimum salary range for the echelon.

columns.name: max_salary
columns.description: Maximum salary range for the echelon.

columns.name: created_on
columns.description: Timestamp indicating when the echelon record was created.

columns.name: updated_on
columns.description: Timestamp of the most recent update to the echelon record.

columns.name: code
columns.description: Unique code identifying the echelon, up to 5 characters.

tables.name: regulation_categories
tables.description: Stores categories for classifying regulations and legal documents.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each regulation category.

columns.name: name
columns.description: Name of the regulation category (e.g., Tax, Labor, Compliance).

columns.name: created_on
columns.description: Timestamp indicating when the regulation category record was created.

columns.name: updated_on
columns.description: Timestamp indicating the most recent update to the regulation category record.

columns.name: is_active
columns.description: Status indicator (1: Active, 0: Inactive).

tables.name: leave_types
tables.description: Defines the various types of leave available for employees.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each leave type.

columns.name: name
columns.description: Name of the leave type (e.g., Annual Leave, Sick Leave).

columns.name: max_days
columns.description: Maximum number of days allowed for this leave type.

columns.name: cycle
columns.description: Leave cycle period (e.g., annual, monthly).

tables.name: kpi_categories
tables.description: Stores categories of Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) for performance evaluation.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each KPI category.

columns.name: name
columns.description: Name of the KPI category (e.g., Efficiency, Accuracy).

columns.name: description
columns.description: Detailed explanation or description of the KPI category.

columns.name: unit
columns.description: Measurement unit for the KPI (e.g., %, hours).

columns.name: created_on
columns.description: Timestamp when the KPI category was created.

columns.name: updated_on
columns.description: Timestamp when the KPI category was last updated.

tables.name: offices
tables.description: Stores information about physical office locations for organizational units.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each office location.

columns.name: name
columns.description: Name or title of the office location.

columns.name: address
columns.description: Complete physical address of the office.

columns.name: postal_code
columns.description: Postal code of the office location.

columns.name: city
columns.description: Reference to the city where the office is located.

columns.name: province
columns.description: Reference to the province where the office is located.

columns.name: country
columns.description: Reference to the country where the office is located.

tables.name: regulations
tables.description: Stores regulation records, including descriptions and file references.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each regulation.

columns.name: category
columns.description: Reference to the regulation category.

columns.name: name
columns.description: Title or name of the regulation.

columns.name: description
columns.description: Detailed description of the regulation's content.

columns.name: created_on
columns.description: Timestamp when the regulation record was created.

columns.name: updated_on
columns.description: Timestamp when the regulation record was last updated.

columns.name: status
columns.description: Status of the regulation (1: Valid, 2: Invalid).

columns.name: file_path
columns.description: Path to the regulation document file for retrieval.

schemas.name: hr
schemas.description: Contains human resources-related data, including employee records, jobs, attendance, and organizational units.

tables.name: jobs
tables.description: Stores information about job positions, including salary ranges and hierarchical echelons.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each job position.

columns.name: title
columns.description: The official title or name of the job, up to 100 characters.

columns.name: echelon
columns.description: Reference to the echelon level associated with this job.

columns.name: min_salary
columns.description: Minimum salary for this job position.

columns.name: max_salary
columns.description: Maximum salary for this job position.

columns.name: created_on
columns.description: Timestamp when the job record was created.

columns.name: updated_on
columns.description: Timestamp of the most recent update to the job record.

columns.name: rank
columns.description: Reference to the rank level associated with this job.

tables.name: units
tables.description: Stores information about organizational units and their hierarchy.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each organizational unit.

columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the organizational unit, up to 100 characters.

columns.name: echelon
columns.description: Echelon level associated with the unit.

columns.name: office
columns.description: Reference to the office where the unit is located.

columns.name: managing_unit
columns.description: Reference to the parent unit that manages this unit.

columns.name: head
columns.description: Identifier for the head of the unit.

columns.name: created_on
columns.description: Timestamp when the unit record was created.

columns.name: updated_on
columns.description: Timestamp of the most recent update to the unit record.

tables.name: employees
tables.description: Stores detailed information about employees and their employment details.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each employee.

columns.name: id_number
columns.description: National identification number of the employee.

columns.name: first_name
columns.description: First name of the employee.

columns.name: last_name
columns.description: Last name of the employee.

columns.name: citizen_number
columns.description: Citizen number or social security number.

columns.name: birth_place
columns.description: Place of birth of the employee.

columns.name: birth_date
columns.description: Date of birth of the employee.

columns.name: address
columns.description: Residential address of the employee.

columns.name: email
columns.description: Email address of the employee.

columns.name: phone_number
columns.description: Contact number of the employee.

columns.name: tax_number
columns.description: Tax identification number of the employee.

columns.name: hire_date
columns.description: Date when the employee was hired.

columns.name: resignation_date
columns.description: Date when the employee resigned, if applicable.

columns.name: rank
columns.description: Reference to the employee's rank.

columns.name: job
columns.description: Reference to the employee's job position.

columns.name: unit
columns.description: Reference to the unit the employee belongs to.

columns.name: manager
columns.description: Reference to the employee's manager.

columns.name: salary
columns.description: Salary of the employee.

columns.name: created_on
columns.description: Timestamp when the employee record was created.

columns.name: updated_on
columns.description: Timestamp of the most recent update to the employee record.

columns.name: sex
columns.description: Gender of the employee (1: Male, 2: Female).

tables.name: dependents
tables.description: Stores information about employees' dependents, including their relationship to the employee.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each dependent.

columns.name: first_name
columns.description: First name of the dependent.

columns.name: last_name
columns.description: Last name of the dependent.

columns.name: relationship
columns.description: Relationship of the dependent to the employee (e.g., spouse, child).

columns.name: employee
columns.description: Reference to the employee associated with this dependent.

columns.name: created_on
columns.description: Timestamp when the dependent record was created.

columns.name: updated_on
columns.description: Timestamp of the most recent update to the dependent record.

tables.name: leaves
tables.description: Records employee leave requests, including leave type, approval status, and duration.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each leave record.

columns.name: employee
columns.description: Reference to the employee requesting the leave.

columns.name: leave_type
columns.description: Reference to the type of leave (e.g., annual, sick leave).

columns.name: start_date
columns.description: Start date of the leave.

columns.name: end_date
columns.description: End date of the leave.

columns.name: total_days
columns.description: Total number of days requested for the leave.

columns.name: paid
columns.description: Indicates whether the leave is paid (1: Paid, 2: Partial, 3: Unpaid).

columns.name: status
columns.description: Approval status of the leave (1: Approved, 2: Rejected, 3: Pending).

columns.name: approved_by
columns.description: Reference to the employee who approved the leave.

columns.name: created_on
columns.description: Timestamp when the leave record was created.

columns.name: updated_on
columns.description: Timestamp of the most recent update to the leave record.

tables.name: leave_entitlements
tables.description: Tracks leave entitlements, usage, and remaining days for each employee.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each leave entitlement record.

columns.name: year
columns.description: The calendar year for which the leave entitlement is valid.

columns.name: employee
columns.description: Reference to the employee associated with the leave entitlement.

columns.name: leave_type
columns.description: Reference to the type of leave.

columns.name: entitlement
columns.description: Total number of leave days entitled to the employee.

columns.name: used
columns.description: Number of leave days used by the employee.

columns.name: remaining
columns.description: Calculated field representing remaining leave days (entitlement - used).

columns.name: valid_fr
columns.description: Start date of the leave entitlement validity period.

columns.name: valid_thru
columns.description: End date of the leave entitlement validity period.

columns.name: status
columns.description: Status of the leave entitlement (1: Active, 2: Pending, 3: Expired, 4: Depleted, 5: Exceeded).

columns.name: created_on
columns.description: Timestamp when the record was created.

columns.name: updated_on
columns.description: Timestamp of the most recent update to the record.

columns.name: description
columns.description: Additional information or notes about the leave entitlement.

tables.name: attendance
tables.description: Stores records of employee attendance, including check-in and check-out times and status.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each attendance record.

columns.name: employee
columns.description: Reference to the employee associated with the attendance record.

columns.name: date
columns.description: Date of the attendance record.

columns.name: check_in
columns.description: Time when the employee checked in.

columns.name: check_out
columns.description: Time when the employee checked out.

columns.name: status
columns.description: Attendance status (0: Absent, 1: Present, 2: Late, 3: Leave, 4: Remote, 5: Business Trip).

columns.name: work_hours
columns.description: Calculated field representing the total hours worked.

columns.name: remarks
columns.description: Additional notes or comments about the attendance record.

columns.name: created_on
columns.description: Timestamp when the record was created.

columns.name: updated_on
columns.description: Timestamp when the record was last updated.

tables.name: kpi
tables.description: Stores Key Performance Indicators (KPI) for employees, tracking their performance over a specified period.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each KPI record.

columns.name: employee
columns.description: Reference to the employee being evaluated.

columns.name: category
columns.description: Reference to the KPI category, defining the type of performance being measured.

columns.name: target_value
columns.description: The expected or target value to be achieved for this KPI.

columns.name: achieved_value
columns.description: The actual value achieved by the employee for this KPI.

columns.name: unit
columns.description: The unit of measurement for the KPI (e.g., %, hours, tasks).

columns.name: period_fr
columns.description: The starting date of the performance evaluation period.

columns.name: period_to
columns.description: The ending date of the performance evaluation period.

columns.name: status
columns.description: The status of the KPI (1: Achieved, 2: Not Met, 3: In Progress, 4: Pending).

columns.name: performance
columns.description: Calculated field representing the performance percentage. If achieved value meets or exceeds the target, it is set to 100%, otherwise calculated as (achieved_value / target_value) * 100.

columns.name: remarks
columns.description: Additional comments or notes regarding the employee's KPI performance.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: Timestamp indicating when the KPI record was created.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.description: Timestamp indicating the most recent update to the KPI record.

columns.name: hire_date

columns.name: job_id

columns.name: job_title

columns.name: rank_id

columns.name: first_name

columns.name: last_name

columns.name: total_employee
